summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of certain property in Blocks 5 and 6, H. E. Nelson Addition; Block 13, Loyal Heights Division No. 6; Block 5, Loyal View Addition; and Unplatted property in the Northeast one-quarter of the Northwest one-quarter of Section 2, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W. M., with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections to be numbered 2-57 and 17-34, respectively.
